#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
long long int  fact(long long int  a)
{
	long long int  i,f=1;
	for(i=1;i<=a;i++)f*=i;
	if(a==0)return 1;
	return f;
}
int main()
{
long long int i,t,facto,n,j,sum=0;
cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {sum=0;
      cin>>n;facto=1;j=1;
      facto=fact(n);
      for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
      {
       sum+=(facto/fact(i))*j;
       j*=-1;
      }
      cout<<sum<<endl;
   }

}
